metadata.Title: CVE-2022-0390 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Improper access control in Gitlab CE/EE versions 12.7 to 14.5.4, 14.6 to 14.6.4, and 14.7 to 14.7.1 allowed for project non-members to retrieve issue details when it was linked to an item from the vulnerability dashboard.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
